_ga.purpose: Google Analytics tracking cookie that monitors user behavior on websites
_ga.privacy_risk: Tracks your browsing patterns across multiple websites. Can build detailed profile of your interests and habits.
_ga.security_risk: Low - Does not contain login credentials or sensitive personal data
_ga.user_friendly_explanation: This cookie helps websites understand how visitors use their site, like which pages are popular. It doesn't access your passwords or personal accounts.
_ga.why_used: Website owners use this to improve their site design and content based on visitor behavior

_gid.purpose: Google Analytics session identifier for distinguishing users
_gid.privacy_risk: Creates unique identifier to track your visit session. Links your activities during a single browsing session.
_gid.security_risk: Low - Session identifier only, no sensitive data stored
_gid.user_friendly_explanation: This helps Google Analytics tell different website visitors apart during the same day. It's like a temporary visitor number.
_gid.why_used: Helps websites count unique visitors and understand daily traffic patterns

_fbp.purpose: Facebook Pixel tracking cookie for advertising and conversion tracking
_fbp.privacy_risk: HIGH PRIVACY RISK: Connects your browsing to your Facebook profile. Tracks you across many websites for targeted advertising.
_fbp.security_risk: Medium - While not containing passwords, it can reveal personal interests and potentially sensitive browsing patterns
_fbp.user_friendly_explanation: This cookie connects your website visits to your Facebook account for targeted advertising. Facebook learns what websites you visit and what you're interested in buying.
_fbp.why_used: Businesses use this to show you relevant ads on Facebook and measure if their ads lead to sales
_fbp.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è PRIVACY ALERT: This cookie significantly impacts your privacy by creating detailed profiles for advertising

sessionid.purpose: Maintains user session state and login status
sessionid.privacy_risk: Medium - Contains session information but not raw credentials
sessionid.security_risk: HIGH SECURITY RISK: If stolen, attacker could impersonate you on this website until session expires
sessionid.user_friendly_explanation: This cookie keeps you logged in to the website. It's like a temporary key that proves you've already entered your password.
sessionid.why_used: Essential for keeping you logged in as you navigate between pages on the website
sessionid.warning: üîí SECURITY CRITICAL: Blocking this will log you out. If compromised, someone could access your account temporarily
sessionid.security_advice: Always log out on shared computers. This cookie should only work on secure (HTTPS) websites.

authToken.purpose: Authentication token for API access and user verification
authToken.privacy_risk: High - Contains authentication information that identifies you
authToken.security_risk: CRITICAL SECURITY RISK: Direct access token. If stolen, attacker has full access to your account and data
authToken.user_friendly_explanation: This is like your digital ID card for this website. It proves who you are without needing to enter your password every time.
authToken.why_used: Allows secure communication between your browser and the website's servers without repeatedly asking for passwords
authToken.warning: üö® CRITICAL SECURITY: This cookie contains authentication data. Never share or allow untrusted access to this
authToken.security_advice: Only use on HTTPS sites. Log out when done. Never access accounts on public/shared computers.

csrftoken.security_risk: PROTECTIVE: This cookie actually protects your security by preventing malicious websites from performing actions on your behalf
csrftoken.user_friendly_explanation: This is a security guard cookie that protects you from malicious websites trying to trick your browser into doing things without your permission.
csrftoken.why_used: Prevents hackers from tricking your browser into performing actions (like transferring money) on websites where you're logged in
csrftoken.security_benefit: ‚úÖ SECURITY PROTECTION: This cookie helps protect your accounts from certain types of attacks

ads_user.purpose: User identifier for advertising personalization and tracking
ads_user.privacy_risk: HIGH PRIVACY RISK: Creates detailed advertising profile. May infer sensitive information about lifestyle, health, finances
ads_user.security_risk: Medium - Could reveal personal interests that might be used for social engineering attacks
ads_user.user_friendly_explanation: This cookie builds a detailed profile of your interests for advertising. Companies learn what you like, buy, and might need.
ads_user.why_used: Shows you ads that are more relevant to your interests instead of random advertisements
ads_user.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è PRIVACY IMPACT: Your browsing creates a detailed profile used for targeted advertising across many websites

Critical.description: Contains authentication data or direct access to accounts
Critical.user_warning: CRITICAL: These cookies can give attackers direct access to your accounts if compromised

High.description: Significant privacy impact or security concerns
High.user_warning: HIGH RISK: These cookies significantly impact your privacy or could pose security risks

Medium.user_warning: MEDIUM: These cookies track your behavior but don't access sensitive accounts

Low.user_warning: LOW RISK: These cookies have minimal privacy impact and may be necessary for website function

session.explanation: Session cookies keep you logged in but can be hijacked by attackers

auth.explanation: Authentication cookies provide access to your account - highest security risk if compromised

tracking.explanation: Tracking cookies monitor your behavior across websites for analytics or advertising

advertising.explanation: Advertising cookies create detailed profiles for targeted marketing and cross-site tracking

security.explanation: Security cookies protect you from attacks - generally safe and beneficial
